name: Come & See
description:
They shot you. It's bad. 

You have 2 minutes left.

They want to watch you die...

Make them pay for that privilege.

Click & Drag or Swipe to shoot. 
Click & Hold on bullets to reload. 
(for optimal experience, Come & See is best played on a mobile touch screen device)

Made for the ScoreSpace x Ultimate Arcade Game Jam.
Art: Mari L. 
Music: Holinza
SFX: Snake's Authentic Gun Sounds
